snippet.title: The Legend of Steel Empire - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Known as Empire of Steel in Europe and Koutetsu Teikoku (鋼鉄帝国) in Japan, The Steel Empire is a 1992 shoot-'em-up for the Sega Mega Drive, recognized for its distinctive diesel-punk aesthetic, combining elements of steampunk and late-19th-century industrial design, setting it apart from other shoot 'em-up games. The HD remaster is based on the PC game from a few years but with High definition graphics and improved controls.

Experience a meticulously stylized alternate world featuring aircraft, weaponry, power-ups, and environments with robust steampunk elements. Jump into this "Age of Steel," and fight fight your way through seven complex stages full of well-balanced euro-shmup action and Goliath-like defenses with armor-piercing missiles!

The Legend of Steel Empire - coming to Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4
